version_name: 1.19:Haven't started selling on Depop? Look out for the extra handy hints to point you in the right direction. We've also squashed a few more of those pesky bugs. Good times.
1.28.1 is just a few bug fixes. As always
1.28.2 is just a few bug fixes.As always

version_description:
In this release we have made a number of performance and maintenance improvements.

Keep an eye out for some exciting new features coming soon, and please keep leaving your reviews so we can make the experience better and better!

In this release we have made a number of performance and maintenance improvements.

Keep an eye out for some exciting new features coming soon, and please keep leaving your reviews so we can make the experience better and better!

In this release we've fixed some crashes and made "under the hood" performance improvements.

New features coming soon very soon! Please keep leaving your reviews so we can make the experience even better.

We told you your shop looked great and we meant it. We've been following #depop on Instagram. Seen everyones updates from the share your shop button we added in our last release. We've now added more networks so you can share with even more people.

Hey video lovers, it's here! Following up on the ability to record a video for your listing, you can now simply upload one.
Listing boyfriend jeans or skinny jeans, loafers or flip flops? Add the subcategory to your listing to make sure it gets found.

- video listings playing sound by default
- saved drafts not actually saving

And also a few other updates behind the scenes to make Depop even better for you.

Move stock. Make bank. You can now set a discount in your shop to increase sales and make way for new items. Head to profile > settings to get started

We're making it easier for you to find items you'll love.
As a seller you'll now only be able to add up to 5 hashtags and only the brand that your item belongs to.
As a buyer this means that your search results will be much more relevant.
